author: craigmcc
msg: More tweaks to improve the printability of the User's Guide, without
having to resort wholesale to smaller font sizes for the examples.  The
entire guide will now print for me in portrait mode.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a banner at the top of the page for the chapter name.

author: craigmcc
msg: Clean up the data source example to be a little more clear.  Also, left justify
the <pre> block so that a smaller font is not necessary.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the parameter name of the third parameter to avoid NullPointerException

author: craigmcc
msg: Document an already existing restriction on "paramType" and "paramTypes"
arguments used within the Digester package.  If the method you ultimately
call has a parameter of a Java primitive type, you must use the
corresponding Java wrapper class (such as "java.lang.Boolean" for a
